text: Peka, mwana wa Lemaliya, yawele ndo yumwe wa vilongozi wa wamizi wa Pekahiya, nayali yochijesa kumditila vibi Pekahiya. Nakawahola wanhu makumi gahano wa Gileadi na kumkopola Pekahiya, hamwe na Aligobu na Aliya, kuli ngome ya ng'handa ya chiundewa ako Samaliya. Ahyo, Peka nakamkopola Pekahiya, hamba nakawa mndewa honhu ha heye.
